title: Clemson Tigers Tickets: CapitalCityTickets.com is Slashing Their Prices on Clemson Tigers Basketball Tickets for their Home Games at Bon Secours Wellness Arena for the 2015-16 Season
text:
Clemson Tigers basketball tickets are on sale now at CapitalCityTickets.com. Trusted secondary ticket market provider CapitalCityTickets.com is providing Tigers fans with promo code CITY5 to save an additional 5% on all orders.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a wide selection of Clemson Tigers basketball tickets at affordable prices. The Clemson Tigers will play their home games at Bon Secours Wellness Arena in Greenville, SC in 2015-16 season.
CLICK HERE to browse all levels of seating for the Clemson Tigers at CapitalCityTickets.com.
CapitalCityTickets.com already offers slashed ticket prices on all their ticket inventory. You can save an additional percentage off by using promo code provided.
